Japanese: 「――――この地下アジトは制圧しました。無駄な抵抗はせず直ちに投降しなさい」
English: ―――― this underground hideout has been overrun. Do not resist in vain and surrender immediately."

Japanese: 「このアジトの最高責任者はあなたのようですので私が連行します」
English: Since you seem to be the chief executive of this hideout, I will bring you in myself."

Japanese: ……わかった、従う
English: ...... Okay, I'll comply.

Japanese: 「話が分かるようで助かります」
English: It helps that you seem to know what you're talking about."

Japanese: 「……そういえばエレナは何をやっているのでしょうか？ここは本来彼女の管轄なはずですが」
English: "......So, what is Erena doing here? This is supposedly her jurisdiction."

Japanese: 「あ――…。エレナは捕まっちゃってね…まあ、油断してたんじゃないかな」
English: "Ah――.... Erena got caught... well, I guess she let her guard down."

Japanese: 「エレナが？？まったく…あの女はいったい何をしてるんですか…帰ったらお説教ですね」
English: Erena? What the hell is that woman doing... I'll give her a lecture when I get home."

Japanese: 「あ、そうだ。ここにあったデータは君が研究したやつかな？結構非倫理的な研究もあったけど」
English: Oh, yes. Is that the data you found here, the ones you studied? Some of the studies were pretty unethical."

Japanese: 「……そういえば誘拐した生徒達はどういう扱いをされているのでしょうか？返答によっては――――」
English: I was wondering, "...... come to think of it, how are the students you abducted being treated? Depending on the response, ――――"

Japanese: 「―――緊急で連絡します！」
English: ―――I'll call you urgently!"

Japanese: …なんだ
English: ...what the hell.

Japanese: 「現在、襲撃により隔壁が破損し厳重保管対象が脱走！既に我々のコントロール下から離れています！」
English: The bulkhead has been breached by the attack and the object in our custody has escaped! It is already out of our control!

Comment: 触手モンスター(シルエット)
Japanese: ズルッ、ズルッ…
English: Zulu, zulu...

Japanese: 「我々にはどうしようもありません！」
English: There is nothing we can do about it!"

Japanese: 「う、うわああああっ！」
English: Uh―oh!"

Japanese: ……今すぐここから離れた方がいい
English: ...... better get away from here now!

Japanese: 「…やれやれ、この期に及んでまだ何か企んでいるのですか？」
English: "...Good grief, are you still up to something at this stage of your life?"

Japanese: 「ちょっとまって……脱走？ここにそんな強いのいたっけ…？」
English: 'Wait a minute... ...... breakout? I don't remember there being anything that strong here...?"

Japanese: その瞬間、赤黒い無数の触手が瓦礫の中から物凄い速度で現れる
English: At that moment, countless reddish―black tentacles emerge from the rubble at a tremendous speed.

Japanese: ズルッ、ズルッ、ビシュッッ！！！
English: Slurp, slurp, bish!

Japanese: 「！ッ、京！、離れてください！」
English: I'm going to go to the airport! Kei! Get away from me!

Japanese: キシャアアアアアッッ！！！
English: Kishaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!
"...fast? How fast?

Japanese: 那由多は向かってきた触手のほとんどを切り落とすが、足に一本の触手を巻きつかれてしまう
English: Nayuta cuts off most of the tentacles that come toward her, but she gets one tentacle wrapped around her leg.

Japanese: 「っ！、何故財団がこれほど強力な怪人を…いや、もはや怪獣ですか？これを地上に出したらどれだけの被害がっ！」
English: I'm not sure why the Foundation would want to create such a powerful monster..! Why did the Foundation create such a powerful monster...or is it a monster now? What kind of damage could it do if it were to be released onto the ground?

Japanese: 「触手型怪人のハイエンド個体…！知能は高くないが聖核エネルギーに反応する…」
English: "A high―end individual of a tentacle―type monster...! It is not highly intelligent, but it reacts to the Seikaku energy..."

Japanese: 「気を付けて会長！多分コイツの狙いは―――」
English: "Be careful, Mr. Chairman! Maybe he's trying to..."
Ugh!

Japanese: 「はあ、はあ、…貴女には私達と一緒に来てもらいます！一番危険なのはやはり貴女ですからっ！」
English: We'll have you come with us! You are the one in the most danger!"

Japanese: 「うぁ、しまっ…た…」
English: "Oh, shit..."

Japanese: 「八雲那由多が気を取られているうちに本部を移動させます！」
English: We'll move headquarters while Yakumo Nayuta is distracted!"

Japanese: わかった。直ちに移動させよう
English: All right, I'm on it. Let's move it immediately.

Japanese: 「あっ、逃げるつもりですかっ！？…！くっ、しかしこの怪物をこのままにしておくわけにはっ」
English: Are you trying to escape? Oh, are you trying to escape? But I can't leave this monster like this.

Japanese: 「待っていてください京！、今すぐ助けに行きますから！」
English: Please wait for me, Kei! I'm coming to save you right now!"

Japanese: 「―――ッ！触手がもう再生した？！」
English: "――――! Tentacles already regenerated?

Japanese: 「しまった、刀がっ！」
English: Oh, no, the sword!

Japanese: 那由多の体に触手が巻きつき、動きが封じられてしまう
English: Tentacles wrap around Nayuta's body, blocking her movement.

Japanese: キシャアアアアアッッ！！！
English: Kishaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!

Japanese: 「ぐっ、こ、このっ、離しなさい！」
English: Get off of me!

Japanese: 「なんて力…っ、この私が振りほどけないなんてっ…今までの触手とは比べ物にならないっ！」
English: I can't shake it off... it's nothing compared to the tentacles I've seen before!

Japanese: 「ますますこんなものを野放しにはしておけませんね…なんとかここで倒さなければっ」
English: We can't let this thing get away with it...we've got to get it down here somehow."

Japanese: 「しかしっ…、このままでは京どころか私も危険ですっ、何とか突破口を…」
English: But...if things continue as they are, not only Kei but myself will be in danger...I have to make a breakthrough somehow..."

Japanese: ギチッ、ミチミチミチッ！
English: Gitch, michi michi michi!

Japanese: 「ぐうっ、ドロドロした粘液が滑ってっ、抜け出せませんっ！」
English: "Ugh, I can't get out, the sloppy mucus is sliding all over me!"

Japanese: 「この程度の触手など…せめて刀があればっ！」
English: I wish I had a sword at least!

Japanese: その時、怪物の口のような部分が開き、那由多の頭上に迫る
English: At that moment, the mouth―like part of the monster opens and looms over Nayuta's head.

Japanese: グパッ、ブジュルルルルルッ！！
English: Gup, buuuurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!

Japanese: 「何ですかっ！？、この化け物っ、口を開いてっ！？」
English: What is it? You monster, open your mouth!

Japanese: グパッ、ジュルッ、ジュルルルッ
English: Gup, julp, julp, julp.

Japanese: 「この化け物、まさか…私を捕食しようとしている…！？」
English: "This monster, don't tell me... it's trying to prey on me...!

Japanese: 「まずいですね…今すぐにでも脱出しなければっ！」
English: This is bad...we have to get out now!"

Japanese: 「――――仕方ありません、しばらくパワーが落ちるので使いたくは無いのですがっ！」
English: "―――― can't help it, I don't want to use it because the power will be down for a while!"

Japanese: 那由多の体から紫色のオーラが沸き上がる
English: A purple aura rises from Nayuta's body.

Japanese: 「聖核エネルギー開放ッ、高出力状態―――――――雷神之相！」
English: "Holy nuclear energy release, high―power state――――――― thunder god no phase!"

Japanese: 「汚らわしい化け物がっ！私から離れなさいっ、ハアッッ！！」
English: You filthy monster! Get away from me, you filthy monster!

Japanese: 那由多は首に纏わりついていた触手を引きちぎり、拘束をほどく
English: Nayuta rips off the tentacles around her neck and unties the restraints.

Japanese: キシャアアアアアッッ！
English: Kishaaaaaaaahhhh!

Japanese: 「――――刀さえ手に入れればこちらのものです。さて、早急にこの怪物を倒してしまいましょう」
English: "―――― If we can just get our hands on a sword, it's ours. Now, let's defeat this monster ASAP."

Japanese: ………キンッ
「ふう、これだけの肉片に切り刻んでおけば再生する心配もないでしょう」
English: 'Wind, if you chop it up into this many pieces, you won't have to worry about it regenerating.'

Japanese: 「……ぐっ、少し体力を消耗し過ぎました。悔しいですが京を追って深追いするのは危険ですね」
English: "......Gosh, I've exhausted my energy a little too much. It's frustrating, but it's dangerous to go after Kei too deep."

Japanese: 「…私としたことが失態です、しかしアジトの大まかな位置はわかりました」
English: I'm afraid I've made a mistake, but I have a rough idea of the location of the hideout.

Japanese: 「もうほとんど戦力は残っていないでしょうし…近く、聖月生徒会の精鋭で再びここを制圧します」
English: There will be very little strength left...and in the near future, the elite of the Holy Moon Student Council will take control of this place again."

Japanese: 那由多による攻撃から一夜明け、アジトは束の間の落ち着きを取り戻していた
English: The night after the attack by Nayuta, the hideout had briefly regained its composure.

Japanese: 「……では、先日アジトを襲撃した聖核戦姫について現在分かっていることをお話しします」
English: At ......, we'll tell you what we currently know about the Seikaku Princess who recently attacked our hideout."

Japanese: よろしく頼む
English: I look forward to working with you

Japanese: 「彼女は“八雲那由多”、聖月生徒会生徒会長にして最強の聖核戦姫です」
English: She is "Yakumo Nayuta," the president of the Seigetsu Student Council and the most powerful holy nuclear Princess.

Japanese: 「海外の財団支部の約半数は彼女によって壊滅させられました」
English: About half of the Foundation's branches abroad have been destroyed by her.

Japanese: 「本来なら、今は海外に行っているはずだったのですが…想定外でした」
English: 'Originally, I would have gone overseas now...it was unexpected.'

Japanese: 「これまでは地下アジトに隠れてきましたが…ここまで深部に侵入された以上、もはや隠れ続けるのは不可能でしょう」
English: So far we have been hiding in our underground hideouts, but now that they have penetrated this deep, it will no longer be possible for us to continue hiding."

Japanese: 「…そして彼女は一人で厳重保管対象の触手怪獣を倒すほどの戦闘能力を持っています」
English: "...and she has enough fighting ability to defeat the tentacle monster in strict custody all by herself."

Japanese: 「私達クローンや戦闘員がどれだけいても勝ち目はないでしょう。単体で強力な戦力が必要です」
English: No matter how many clones and fighters we have, we won't stand a chance. We need a strong stand―alone force."

Japanese: 「……時間はあまりありません。速やかに新たな作戦を開始しましょう」
English: "We don't have much time at ....... Let's start a new operation as soon as possible."

Japanese: 聖月生徒会にて
English: At the Holy Moon Student Council

Japanese: 「―――では作戦の概要はこの通りです。今度こそ財団との戦いを終わらせます」
English: ――― "So, here's the gist of the operation. This time we will end the war with the Foundation."

Japanese: 「何か質問のある方はいますか？」
English: Does anyone have any questions?"

Japanese: 「どうしましたか？」
English: Can I help you?"

Japanese: 「本当に大丈夫なんでしょうか…いくら那由多先輩がいるとは言えエレナ先輩が負けた相手に…」
English: I wonder if it's really okay...no matter how much Nayuta―senpai is there, against whom Erena―senpai lost..."

Japanese: 「…それに那由多先輩が仕留めきれないなんて…そんな相手、私達で大丈夫なのでしょうか…？」
English: And Nayuta―senpai can't finish him off...will we be able to handle such an opponent?

Japanese: 「そうですね…はい、心配する必要は全くありません」
English: Well...yes, no need to worry at all."

Japanese: 「アジト内部にはそれほど強い怪人はいませんでした。エレナが負けたと言っても油断から不意打ちされたのでしょう」
English: There were no strong monsters inside the hideout. Even if Erena lost, it was probably because she was caught off guard.

Japanese: 「少し強かった怪人も私がほとんど無力化しました。今、あの支部にほとんど戦う力は残ってないでしょう」
English: I have almost neutralized the monsters that were a little stronger than the others. There will be very little strength left in that branch to fight now."

Japanese: 「……そしてこの私がいるのです。どう間違っても失敗などという事はありえません」
English: I am here at ...... and here I am. There is no such thing as failure, no matter how wrong you are."

Japanese: 「私達が行うのは圧倒的に有利な殲滅戦です。心配は杞憂です、私に付いてきなさい」
English: What we will do is a battle of extermination with overwhelming odds in our favor. Your fears are unfounded. Follow me."

Japanese: その時、執務室に一人の生徒が入ってくる
English: At that moment, a student walks into the office.

Japanese: 「連絡します！現在都市内の複数個所で同時多発的に怪人と戦闘員が出現したとの報告がありました！」
English: "Attention! We have reports of simultaneous appearances of monsters and combatants in multiple locations in the capital city at this time!"

Japanese: 「…隠れていればいいものをわざわざ向こうから出てくるとは…最後の悪あがきですか？」
English: "...is it a last ditch effort to come out from the other side when all you had to do was hide?"

Japanese: 「都市中央部に戦闘員が多数出現し、既にセントラルタワーの警備システムは半壊、占拠されかけているようです！」
English: "A large number of combatants have appeared in the center of the city, and it appears that the security system of the Central Tower is already half―collapsed and nearly occupied!

Japanese: 「思ったより早い展開ですね…また何か小細工でもしているのでしょうか……」
English: "This is unfolding faster than I expected...are they playing some tricks on us again?" ......

Japanese: 「―――作戦が少し前倒しになっただけです。前倒しで作戦を開始します、部隊ごとに各地の敵を撃破してください」
English: "―――― The operation has just been moved up a little bit. We will start the operation ahead of schedule. Please destroy the enemy in each area by unit."

Japanese: 「聖核戦姫：ヒスイ、エメラルド、アクアマリンは私と一緒に来てください。私達でセントラルタワーを奪還します」
English: Holy Nuclear Princess: Jade, Emerald, and Aquamarine come with me. We will retake the Central Tower ourselves."

Japanese: 「これが恐らく最後の戦いになるでしょう。では皆さん、ご武運を祈ります」
English: This will probably be my last fight. So, ladies and gentlemen, I wish you all the best of luck.

Japanese: セントラルタワー内部
English: Inside the Central Tower

Japanese: 「邪魔です。通しなさい」
English: You are in my way. Let me through."

Japanese: 「ぐあっ！？」
English: AUGH!

Japanese: 那由多達は戦闘員達を撃破し、セントラルタワーの中枢へ向かっていた
English: Nayuta and his team had defeated the fighters and were heading for the center of the Central Tower.

Japanese: 「さて、ここが建物中心部でしょうか？大した敵はいませんでしたね」
English: Now, is this the center of the building? I didn't see any major enemies."
"......! Who are you!"

Japanese: 「聖月生徒会です。セントラルタワーを開放しに来ました―――エレナ？なぜあなたがこんな所に？」
English: This is the Holy Moon Student Council. We're here to open up the Central Tower―――Erena? Why are you here?"

Japanese: 「…那由多ですか」
English: Nayuta?

Japanese: 「貴女は財団に敗北し、拉致されていたたはずでは？一体ここで何をやっているのですか？」
English: "Weren't you supposed to have been defeated and abducted by the Foundation? What on earth are you doing here?"

Japanese: 「……財団を抜け出して一足早くここへ来ただけです。ここの職員は皆私が避難させました」
English: "I just got out of the ...... foundation and came here a step early. I evacuated all the staff here myself."

Japanese: 「………そうですか。それなら連絡してくれればよかったのに」
English: '......... I see. Then you should have contacted me."

Japanese: 「…とはいえここまで財団による被害が大きくなった原因は貴女にあります」
English: ...but you are the cause of the damage done by the foundation.

Japanese: 「貴女なら大丈夫だと思っていたのですが、情けなくもこの程度の敵に負けてしまうとは…」
English: I thought you would be all right, but you were pitifully defeated by an enemy of this caliber."

Japanese: 「やれやれ、少し貴女の実力を買いかぶり過ぎていたかもしれませんね」
English: I may have overestimated your abilities a bit.

Japanese: 「…そうですね。理解しています」
English: I understand. I understand."

Japanese: 「貴女にしてはやけに素直ですね…」
English: For a woman like you, you're awfully straightforward..."

Japanese: 「おそらく副会長は解任となるでしょう。聖核戦姫の戦闘ライセンスの剝奪もあり得ます」
English: The vice president will probably be dismissed. "Perhaps the vice president will be removed from his post, and the license to fight for the Seikaku of War will be revoked.

Japanese: 「…まあそのことは後で考えましょう。帰還します、エレナ、私に付いてきなさい」
English: "...well, we'll figure that out later. We will return, Erena, follow me."

Japanese: 那由多と他三人の生徒はエレナに背を向け部屋の外へ向かう
English: Nayuta and three other students turn their backs to Erena and head out of the room.

Japanese: 「………ええ、わかりました」
「………………変身、聖核戦姫、コード：ゴールド。」
English: ".................. transformation, Holy Nuclear Princess, code: gold."

Japanese: ガキィィン！！
English: Gakiin!

Japanese: 那由多の刀がエレナの矛を防ぐ
English: Nayuta's sword prevents Erena's spear.

Japanese: 「流石那由多、この奇襲も防ぎますか」
English: "Nayuta is a master at preventing surprise attacks."

Japanese: 「…………エレナ…？自分が何をしているのか分かっているのですか？」
English: "............ Erena...? Do you know what you are doing?"

Japanese: 「すべては私の意思です。……私は今ここで、――――貴女を討ちます」
English: It is all my will. ...... I will avenge you here and now ――――."

Japanese: 「…………エレナ…？自分が何をしているのか分かっているのですか？」
English: "............ Erena...? Do you know what you are doing?"

Japanese: 「すべては私の意思です。……私は今ここで、――――貴女を討ちます」
English: It is all my will. ...... I will avenge you here and now ――――."

Japanese: エレナの体から赤色のオーラが沸き上がり、赤黒いスーツが身に纏わられる
English: Erena's body is covered with a red aura and a reddish―black suit.

Japanese: 「変身完了…ふう、まだこの変身は慣れませんね」
English: Transformation complete....phew, I still can't get used to this transformation."

Japanese: 「………エレナ、今ならまだ許します。馬鹿な真似は辞めて学園に戻りなさい」
English: "......... Erena, I can still forgive you now. Quit your foolishness and return to the academy."

Japanese: 「……それとも本気で私と戦うつもりですか？」
English: ...... or are you seriously going to fight me?"

Japanese: 「！清藤エレナッ！いったい何のつもり！？」
English: "! Seidō Erena! What the hell are you doing!

Japanese: 「那由多先輩に攻撃なんてッ！それにその恰好…！」
English: I can't believe you attacked Nayuta―senpai! And you're dressed like that...!

Japanese: 「エレナ先輩目を覚ましてください！私達も戦いますっ！変身っ！」
English: Erena―senpai, please wake up! We will fight too! Transform!

Japanese: 「―――――あなた達に興味はありません」
English: "――――― is not interested in any of you."

Japanese: 「―――っ！いけませんっ、離れて―――――ッ」
English: I can't..! Don't do it, get away from ―――――."

Japanese: ザシュッ！
English: Zash!

Japanese: エレナの矛の一太刀で三人の聖核戦姫が地面に崩れ落ちる
English: Erena's single stroke of her contraption sends the three holy nuclear Princesses crashing to the ground.

Japanese: 「…っ！変身、コード：オブシディアンッ！……話し合いの余地は無さそうですね。」
English: "...! Transformation, code: obsidianck! ...... seems there is no room for discussion."

Japanese: 「ようやく私と戦う気になりましたか？あなたにしては判断が遅いですね」
English: You are finally ready to fight me? You are slow to judge, even for you."

Japanese: 「……清藤エレナ。あなたの行動を聖月生徒会に対する重大な反逆とみなします。」
English: "...... Seidō Erena. We consider your actions to be a grave rebellion against the Seigetsu Student Council."

Japanese: 「貴女と戦いたくはなかったですが…。慈悲があると思わないでください！」
English: I did not want to fight you, but.... Don't think I have mercy on you!"

Japanese: ガキンッ！ガキィィッ！
English: Gakikk! Gaki―iii!

Japanese: ホールに金属が激しくぶつかり合う音が響く
English: The sound of metal clashing violently echoes through the hall.

Japanese: 「―――どうしました？私の記憶では貴女はもっと強かったはずですが」
English: "What's wrong? From what I remember, you were stronger than this."

Japanese: (ぐっ、この膂力、かつてのエレナとは比べ物になりませんっ)
English: (Gosh, this physical strength is nothing compared to the Erena of the past!)

Japanese: 「っ！、…貴女こそ本気で私に勝てると思っているのですかっ？」
English: I'm not sure I can beat you! Do you really think you can beat me?"

Japanese: 「それにっ、…プライドの高いあなたがこんなっ、一体財団に何をされたのですか？！」
English: And you, with all your pride, what in the world have you done to the Foundation?

Japanese: 「……財団には愚かな私を洗脳して更なる力を頂きました。しかし――――これは私の意思です」
English: "The ...... Foundation has given me further power by brainwashing me out of my foolishness. But ―――― this is my will."

Japanese: 「……っ、いったい何のためにそんな事を！これ以上力を求めて何の意味があるのですかっ！？」
English: I said to myself, "......, what in the world is the point of that? What's the point of asking for more power?

Japanese: 「……ここで私が貴女を倒せば聖月生徒会は崩壊します。統制を失った聖核戦姫は全て財団の管理下に置かれるでしょう」
English: "If I defeat you here at ......, the Holy Moon Student Council will collapse. All the Seikaku Princesses who have lost control will be placed under the control of the Foundation."

Japanese: 「なにを馬鹿なことを！学園のあの子たちを守るのが力ある私達の使命でしょう！？」
English: What nonsense! It's our mission to protect those kids in the academy!

Japanese: 「ええ、ですが考えてもみてください。私や貴女のような未熟な者がこれだけ強大な力を持っているのがどれだけ危険な事か」
English: Yes, but think about it. How dangerous it is for someone as inexperienced as you and I to be so powerful."

Japanese: 「っ！、だから聖核戦姫は多くの大人から狙われます。だからこそ、そんな私達を守れるのは私達自身でしかないっ！」
English: I'm not sure I want to be a part of this! That's why the Seikaku Princess is targeted by many adults. That is why we are the only ones who can protect us!

Japanese: 「確かに私達は現在自分自身で戦って身の安全を守っています。しかしそんなことがいつまで続くでしょう？」
English: We are fighting for our own safety now, but how long can that last? But how long can that last?"

Japanese: 「財団に囚われてわかりました。力だけでは勝てない存在がいると」
English: I found out when I was trapped in the Foundation. I realized that there are beings who cannot be defeated by force alone."

Japanese: 「聖核戦姫の力は私達の手に余ります。財団のような真に力のある組織に適切に管理された方が健全でしょう」
English: The power of the Seikaku is beyond our control. It would be healthier if it were properly managed by a truly powerful organization like the Foundation."

Japanese: 「……っ！何を訳のわからないことをっ！そんな世界を受け入れられるわけがないでしょう！目を覚ましなさい！」
English: I'll tell you what... "......! What nonsense! How can you accept such a world? Wake up!

Japanese: 「…そして那由多、あなたに対してです」
English: "...and to you, Nayuta.

Japanese: 「っ！、いまさら何をっ？」
English: "What? What are you doing now?

Japanese: 「私に面倒な業務ばかり押し付けてっ！、自分は海外に行ったきり帰ってこない！」
English: He said, "You keep putting me through all this trouble, and then you go overseas and never come back! You go overseas and never come back!"

Japanese: 「なっ…私も遊んでいたわけではないのですがっ！確かに生徒会長の仕事は多忙でしたが…」
English: I was not playing around either! It's true that I was very busy as student body president, but..."

Japanese: 「私ももっと戦いたかったのに！つまらない書類仕事ばかり！」
English: 'I wanted to fight more too! All that boring paperwork!"

Japanese: 「っ、私の方が強いのですから私が戦闘任務をするのは当然です！」
English: I'm stronger than you, so it's only natural that I should be the one doing the combat duty!"

Japanese: 「―――そして同い年なのにあなたはいつも私の上を行って！比べられる私の気持ちを考えたことありますかっ！？」
English: And you always go above me, even though we're the same age! Have you ever considered how I feel being compared to you!"

Japanese: 「――っ、それは貴女の問題でしょうっ！」
English: That's your problem!

Japanese: (まずいですね…思ったよりもエレナの火力が高いです、速く戦いを終わらせないと…！)
English: (Not good... Erena's firepower is higher than I thought, we have to finish the fight fast...!)

Japanese: 「……わかりましたっ、今後のことは二人でよく話し合いましょう。戦いを辞めて学園に戻って―――――」
English: I understand,......, let's discuss the future between us. Quit the fight and go back to the academy ―――――."

Japanese: 「……今更何を言っているのですか？私はもう学園に戻るつもりなどありません」
English: "......What are you saying now? I have no intention of returning to the academy."

Japanese: 職員だと思っていた人々が次々に戦闘員の姿に変わっていく
English: One by one, people who thought they were staff members are transformed into combatants.

Japanese: 「なっ！？、あなた達っ！？」
English: What? You guys?

Japanese: 「那由多、貴女はここで私に負けるのです」
English: Nayuta, you are losing to me here.

Japanese: 「――――迷っている場合ではありませんね。聖核エネルギー全開ッ！“雷神之相”！」
English: ―――― is not the time to get lost. The Seikaku energy is in full swing! "Thunder God phase!"

Japanese: 「雑兵がどれだけいようと関係ありません。私は最強の聖核戦姫です。まとめてかかってきなさい！」
English: I don't care how many small fry there are. I am the most powerful holy nuclear Princess. Get it together and come at me!"

Japanese: 戦闘開始
English: 戦闘開始

Japanese: 戦闘終了
English: 戦闘終了

Japanese: 「ハアッ、ハァ、いい加減に諦めなさい！あなたが私に勝てるわけがないでしょう！」
English: 'Hah, hah, give it up for good! There is no way you can beat me!"

Japanese: 「ハア、ハアッ、那由多こそだいぶ息が上がっていますよッ？限界が近いんでしょ？！」
English: I'm sure you're breathing very hard, Nayuta. You must be near your limit!

Japanese: 「……っ、そんなわけがっ！――――がはっ！？」
English: I'm not sure how that's possible! ―――― is what?

Japanese: 那由多は口から血を吐き、地面に膝をつく
English: Nayuta spits blood from his mouth and kneels on the ground

Japanese: 「ハアッ、ハアッ……！どうやら力の反動が来たようですね…！」
English: 'Haaah, haaah ......! Looks like the force is rebounding...!"

Japanese: 「貴女の強化状態の前に一分と立っていられた者はいませんでしたから、長期戦を想定していないのでしょう？」
English: No one could stand for a minute in front of your enhanced state, so you're not planning for a prolonged battle, are you?"

Japanese: 「ゴホッ、ガハッ、…ぐうっ、私がここで倒れるわけにはっ！」
English: "Gosh, gah, ... gosh, I'm not going to fall down here!"

Japanese: 「これで終わりです八雲那由多…！、あなたが次に目を覚ますときが聖核戦姫の最後です！」
English: "This is the end, Yakumo Nayuta..! The next time you wake up will be the last of the Seikaku Princess!"

Japanese: 「――――ふざけないでっ！私が負けるはずがないっ！聖核戦姫の魂は屈しないっ！」
English: I'm not going to let you beat me! I will not be defeated! The spirit of the Holy Nuclear Princess will not yield!

Japanese: 「………八雲那由多は気絶しました。――――私達の勝利です」
English: "......... Yakumo Nayuta fainted. ―――― we have won."
